amendment.description: An amendment numbered 219 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of military construction funds for a new Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A074) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.
